data.title: Duke Philip Valois of Burgundy
data.text:
Mehitable Burgess was born on 27 May 1772. (1) Parents: Lt. Joseph Burgess and Mehitable Shepard.

Mercy Burgess was born before 15 May 1737.(1) Parents: Joseph Burgess and Thankful Snow.

Mercy Burgess was born before 29 Nov 1741.(1) Parents: Joseph Burgess and Thankful Snow.

Nancy Burgess was born on 25 Dec 1806.(1) Parents: Benjamin Shepard Burgess and Rebecca Chapin.

Nelson Burgess was born on 22 Aug 1824.(1) Parents: Benjamin Shepard Burgess and Rebecca Chapin.

Patience Burgess

She was married to Jonathan Nye.

Phoebe Burgess was born on 2 Apr 1728.(1) Parents: Joseph Burgess and Thankful Snow.

Rebecca Burgess was born on 17 Jan 1667/68 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA. (31)(412) (13) Also have birth as 17 Jan 1666/67. [Plymouth & Cape Cod MA Genealogy] Parents: Joseph Burgess and Patience Freeman.

She was married to Edward Rose about 1692.

Rebecca Burgess was born in 1835.(1) Parents: Joseph Clark Burgess and Elizabeth Cooley.

Rosina Burgess was born on 16 Oct 1808.(1) Parents: Benjamin Shepard Burgess and Rebecca Chapin.

Ruth Burgess was born about 1645. She died on 22 Jun 1693. From Gibson. [BINGHAM.GED] Parents: Thomas Burgess and Dorothy Waynes.

Samuel Burgess was born on 8 Mar 1670/71 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA. (31) Parents: Jacob Burgess and Mary Nye.

He was married to Elisbeth Hopkins in 1703.

Sarah R. Burgess was born on 23 Jul 1818.(1) Parents: Benjamin Shepard Burgess and Rebecca Chapin.

Seth Burgess was born on 3 Jun 1744.(1) Parents: Joseph Burgess and Thankful Snow.

Thankful Burgess Parents: Joseph Burgess and Thankful Snow.

Thomas Burgess was born on 16 Aug 1601 in Truro, Cornwall, England. (31)(1) He died on 13 Feb 1684/85 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA.(31) Parents: Thomas Burgess and Elizabeth Pye.

He was married to Dorothy Waynes about 1627 in Truro, Cornwall, England.(1) Also have marriage as 1628 in Tanfield, Durham, England. BINGHAM.GED has Tanfield in Yorkshire, England. [jl]

Burgess homepage has the following: Married: 1628 at: Truro, Cornwall,

England Children were: Thomas Burgess, Elizabeth Burgess, John Burgess, Jacob Burgess, Joseph Burgess, Ruth Burgess.

Notes

Thomas Burgess was born about 1628 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA. (64)(31) He died on 26 Feb 1716/17 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA.(31) From Cranda. Married Lydia Gaunt (1630-1684) abt 1667 and Elizabeth Bassett 8 Nov 1648. Year of birth (1627) from Gibson, who says death occurred on 26 Feb 1717. On marriage to Bassett, see NEHGR, ix, 313. Died ca 1687. [BINGHAM.GED] Parents: Thomas Burgess and Dorothy Waynes.

He was married to Elizabeth Bassett on 8 Nov 1648.

He was married to Lydia Gaunt about 1667.

Thomas Burgess was born on 29 Mar 1680 in Sandwich, Barnstable, MA. (31) He died in 1757. Burgess homepage has the following: Died: 1757 at: probably Martha's Vinyard. Parents: Jacob Burgess and Mary Nye.

He was married to Joanna.

Thomas Burgess was born about 1570 in of Truro, Cornwall, England. (1) He died on 20 Jul 1626 in Truro, Cornwall, England. (1) Parents: Thomas Burgess and Honor Sidman.

He was married to Elizabeth Pye on 27 Nov 1598 in of Truro, Cornwall, England.(1) Children were: Thomas Burgess.

Thomas Burgess was born about 1540 in of Truro, Cornwall, England. (1) Parents: Ellice Burgess.

He was married to Honor Sidman about 1577 in of Tregony, Cornwall, England.(1) Children were: Thomas Burgess.

Elizabeth de Burgh died on 26 Oct 1327. Parents: Earl Richard de Burgh.

She was married to King Robert I Bruce of Scotland in 1302. Children were: John Bruce, Matilda Bruce, Margaret Bruce, King David II Bruce of Scotland.

Elizabeth de Burgh died on 10 Dec 1363 in Dublin, Dublin, Ireland. Daughter and heiress of William de Burgh. {Burke's Peerage} [GADD.GED] Parents: Sir William de Burgh.

She was married to Duke Lionel Plantagenet on 9 Sep 1342 in Tower of London, London, England. Children were: Philippa Plantagenet.

John de Burgh

He was married to Elizabeth de Clare.

Earl Richard de Burgh 3rd Earl of Ulster. [GADD.GED]

Children were: Elizabeth de Burgh.

Sir William de Burgh. 3rd Earl of Ulster. [GADD.GED]

Children were: Elizabeth de Burgh.

Maud Burghersh was born about 1316.

She was married to Robert Grey. Children were: Maud (Matilda) Grey.

Countess Adelaide (Adelais) of Burgundy was born in 932. (2) Parents: Gilbert (Gislebert) of Burgundy and Ermengarde of Burgundy.

She was married to Letald Macon. Children were: Countess Gerberge of Burgundy.

Adelheid of Burgundy was born in 884.(2) Parents: Conrad of Burgundy.

She was married to Richard of Burgundy. Children were: Ermengarde of Burgundy.

Countess Agnes of Burgundy was born in 995.(2) She died in 1068.(2) Parents: Otto William of Burgundy and Ermentrude (Irmtrude) of Rheims.

She was married to William III (V) of Aquitaine. Children were: Agnes of Aquitaine, William (Guillaume) VI (VIII) of Aquitaine.

Alice of Burgundy was born in 894.(2) Parents: Richard of Burgundy.

She was married to Count Rainer II of Hainault. Children were: Count Rainer III of Hainault.

Anne of Burgundy died on 14 Nov 1432 in Paris, Seine, France. Daughter of John the Fearless, Duke of Burgundy. {Burke's Peerage} [GADD.GED] Parents: Duke John the Fearless of Burgundy.

She was married to Duke John of Lancaster on 17 Apr 1423 in Troyes, Aube, France.

Countess Beatrice de Burgundy Countess of Clermont. [THELMA.GED]

She was married to Count Robert Capet. Children were: Duke Louis Capet.

Bertha of Burgundy Parents: Conrad le Pacifique and Mathilde Carolingian.

She was married to Eudes I of Blois. Children were: Eudes II of Blois.

Duke Charles the Rash of Burgundy was born on 10 Nov 1433. He died in 1477. Helped his wifeÂ’s brother to regain the throne (Edward IV). Brother-in-law of Sir Thomas St. Leger. Duke of Burgundy, Holland and Brabant. Count of Flanders, Luxembourg and Namur. [THELMA.GED]

He was married to Duchess Margaret Plantagenet. Children were: Mary of Burgundy.

Holy Roman Emperor Conrad II Franconia of Burgundy was born in 990. He died in 1039 in Germany.(2) Conrad II (c. 990-1039), king of Germany and emperor of the Romans, founder of the Franconian dynasty. In 1026 he was crowned king of Italy at Milan; the following year he received the imperial crown at Rome. In 1032 he added the duchy of Burgundy to the empire. He died in Germany in 1039. [World Wide Illustrated Encyclopedia, 1935] Parents: Henry of Franconia and Adelheid of Equiseheim.

He was married to Duchess Gisele of Swabia. Children were: Holy Roman Emperor Henry III the Black Franconia of Germany.

Conrad III of Burgundy

He was married. Children were: Gerberge of Burgundy.

Conrad of Burgundy was born in 858.(2)

He was married. Children were: Adelheid of Burgundy.

Duchess Constance of Burgundy was born in 1040.(2) She died in 1092.(2) Parents: Robert I of (Bourgogne) Burgundy and Ella (Ermengarde Helie) of Semur.

She was married to King Alfonso VI of Leon and Castile. Children were: Queen Urraca Alfonsez of Castile.

Ermengarde of Burgundy was born in 908.(2) Parents: Richard of Burgundy and Adelheid of Burgundy.

She was married to Gilbert (Gislebert) of Burgundy. Children were: Countess Adelais Were (De Challons) of Vermandois, Countess Adelaide (Adelais) of Burgundy.

Countess Gerberge of Burgundy was born in 956.(2) Parents: Letald Macon and Countess Adelaide (Adelais) of Burgundy.

She was married to Marquis Adalbert of Ivrea. Children were: Otto William of Burgundy, Bertha Ivrea.

Gerberge of Burgundy was born. Also have birth as 1007. [Our Family Museum]

She was married to William II of Provence. Children were: William Bertrand of Provence, Geoffry I of Arles.

Gerberge of Burgundy was born in 970.(2) Parents: Conrad III of Burgundy.

She was married to Hermann II of Swabia. Children were: Duchess Gisele of Swabia.

Gilbert (Gislebert) of Burgundy was born in 890.(2) He died in 956.(2)

He was married to Ermengarde of Burgundy. Children were: Countess Adelais Were (De Challons) of Vermandois, Countess Adelaide (Adelais) of Burgundy.

Gisela (Gille) of Burgundy was born in 1060.(2) Parents: Count William I of Burgundy and Stephanie of Barcelona.

She was married to Humbert de Maurienne. Children were: Adelaide (Alix) of Savoy, Count Amadeo III of Savoy.

Henry of Burgundy was born in 1035.(2) He died in 1112.(2) Parents: Henry of Burgundy and Sibil of Burgundy.

He was married to Princess Teresa of Leon and Castile. Children were: King Alfonso I Henriquez of Portugal.

Henry of Burgundy was born in 1009.(2)

He was married to Sibil of Burgundy. Children were: Henry of Burgundy.

Duke John the Fearless of Burgundy

Children were: Anne of Burgundy.

Mary of Burgundy. Parents: Duke Charles the Rash of Burgundy and Duchess Margaret Plantagenet.

She was married to Holy Roman Emperor Maximilian I Hapsburg on 18 Aug 1477 in Ghent, Flanders. Children were: Margaret Hapsburg, Archduke Philip of Austria.

Otto William of Burgundy died in 1026.(2) Parents: Marquis Adalbert of Ivrea and Countess Gerberge of Burgundy.

He was married to Ermentrude (Irmtrude) of Rheims. Children were: Countess Agnes of Burgundy, Count Renaud I of Palatine.

Duke Philip Valois of Burgundy died in 1404. Duke of Burgundy. [GADD.GED] Parents: King John II Valois (the Good) of France and Bonne of Luxembourg.
